page.title: 19 CHURCH ANNIVERSARIES
page.content: Two churches in our locality are celebrating anniversaries this year. As old as the Domesday Book is{ {Malvern Priory}and celebrating its centenary is{St. Andrew's Church, {Poolbrook.}Each is holding events of celebration throughout the year. Both have had{Ecumenical Open-air {services}the one at the{Priory attracting some 2000 people.Both have also had musical events with, among others the{English String Orchestra at the{Priory}and{Malvern Witness {Choir}at{St. Andrew's. Each has had services taken by previous or visiting clergy and have made great efforts to involve as many of the local community as well as the normal 'families' of the church in their celebrations.{St. Andrew's}in particular, in asking people to renew their Baptismal or Marriage Vows.
